value.title: Meta burned $19 billion on VR last year, and 2026 won’t be any better
value.content: The reported financial losses follow a series of layoffs at the VR unit.

value.title: Zuckerberg teases agentic commerce tools and major AI rollout in 2026
value.content: Mark Zuckerberg says 2026 will be "a big year for delivering personal super intelligence."

value.title: Trump energy department loosens rules on nuclear safety
value.content: The new rules apply to nuclear reactors built on Department of Energy property, which includes several currently being developed by startups.

value.title: Microsoft gained $7.6B from OpenAI last quarter
value.content: Microsoft, one of OpenAI's major investors, is benefiting greatly from the AI lab's growth.

value.title: Tesla is killing off the Model S and Model X
value.content: The company will stop making the pioneering EVs in the second quarter of 2026, CEO Elon Musk announced Wednesday.

value.title: Mark Zuckerberg says a future without smart glasses is ‘hard to imagine’
value.content: Take Zuckerberg's outlook with a grain of salt. After all, he thought we'd all be hanging out in the metaverse by now.

value.title: Tesla to invest $2B in Elon Musk’s xAI
value.content: Elon Musk's AI company xAI  disclosed earlier this month it had raised $20 billion.

value.title: Elon Musk teases a new image-labeling system for X… we think?
value.content: Elon Musk says X will begin identifying "manipulated media" but doesn't share details.

value.title: SpaceX is coming to the public markets, and secondaries are already on fire
value.content: paceX is reportedly lining up four major Wall Street banks for a 2026 IPO that could provide the reset the market needs.  The company just completed a tender offer at an $800 billion valuation, and secondary market demand is through the roof. If SpaceX goes public anywhere near its rumored $1.5 trillion valuation, it could trigger an IPO cascade for other late-stage unicorns like OpenAI, Stripe, and Databricks.  Watch as Equity host Rebecca Bellan […]

value.title: AI security startup Outtake raises $40M from Iconiq, Satya Nadella, Bill Ackman, and other big names
value.content: Outtake makes an agentic cybersecurity platform to help enterprises detect identity fraud. Its angel investors read like a who's who of tech industry names.

value.title: Tesla profit tanked 46% in 2025
value.content: The company's sales fell for a second year in a row, as Tesla looks to AI and robotics, including a new $2 billion investment in CEO Elon Musk's company xAI.

value.title: ServiceNow inks another AI partnership, this time with Anthropic
value.content: ServiceNow partners with Anthropic just a week after announcing a partnership with OpenAI as the company takes a multi-model approach.

value.title: Luminar sale approved despite last-minute mystery bid
value.content: An unidentified bidder submitted a Hail Mary offer that was "substantially higher" than the winning bid at auction. Founder Austin Russell has been circling a bid, but it's not clear he was behind it.

value.title: WhatsApp will now charge AI chatbots to operate in Italy
value.content: WhatsApp plans to charge developers of AI chatbots per message.

value.title: Jennifer Garner’s Once Upon a Farm resumes IPO plans
value.content: The organic kids' snack food company may debut as soon as next week. It has issued a price range for shares, an SEC filing shows.

value.title: AI data labeler Handshake buys  Cleanlab, an acquisition target of multiple others
value.content: The deal’s purpose is primarily to acquire talent, aka an acqui-hire, adding nine key Cleanlab employees to Handshake’s research organization.

value.title: Chrome takes on AI browsers with tighter Gemini integration, agentic features for autonomous tasks
value.content: Google Chrome is adding Gemini in the sidebar and is rolling out an agentic feature for AI Pro and Ultra users.

value.title: Apple tells Patreon to move creators to in-app purchase for subscriptions by November
value.content: Patreon isn’t happy about Apple’s new subscription billing mandate, arguing Apple’s shifting rules create uncertainty for creators.

value.title: Tiny startup Arcee AI built a 400B-parameter open source LLM from scratch to best Meta’s Llama
value.content: 30-person startup Arcee AI has released a 400B model called Trinity, which it says is one of the biggest open source foundation models from a U.S. company.

value.title: Elon Musk reportedly wants a June SpaceX IPO to align with his birthday, the planets
value.content: SpaceX eyes June for IPO to align with Musk's birthday and the planets.
